snippet: Lovers of animation of all kinds are highly encouraged to head over to the New Museum on November 17 for a one-time screening of 20 new cutting-edge short films.
abstract: Lovers of animation of all kinds are highly encouraged to head over to the New Museum on November 17 for a one-time screening of 20 new cutting-edge short films.

headline.main: Cartoon Network | 'Aboveground Animation' at the New Museum
